text: dhikkarigala karmagalella batta bayalalliruva maricikeyantiruttave. Dahiyu, aduve nirendu bhramisuttane. Konege avanu adara hattira hodaga alli avanu enannu kanuvudilla. Nijavagi avanu tanna bali allahanannu kanuttane mattu avanu (allahanu) atana vicaraneyannu mugisi biduttane. Allahanantu bahala vegavagi vicarane nadesuvavanagiddane
